title: Pricing Component Filter Test
custom_preconds:
Given 
User is on https://www.mlb.com/mets/tickets/pricing page
custom_steps:
THEN
Verify that an opponent filter is present on the page.
Select the opponent filter from the drop-down menu.
Verify that the correct opponent is selected and the corresponding games are displayed.
Verify that the games displayed are only against the selected opponent.
custom_expected: The Opponent filter should correctly filter the games by the selected opponent and display only the corresponding games.

title: Pricing component - Date selection Test
custom_preconds:
Given
User is on https://www.mlb.com/mets/tickets/pricing page
custom_steps:
When
Verify that a date selection feature is present on the page.
Select a date from the date selection feature.
Verify that the correct date is selected and corresponding games are displayed
Verify that the games displayed are only for the selected date.
custom_expected:
THEN
The date selection feature should correctly filter the games by the selected date and display only the corresponding games.

title: Pricing component - Day selection Test
custom_preconds:
Given
User is on https://www.mlb.com/mets/tickets/pricing page
custom_steps:
When
Locate the day selection feature on the page
Select a specific day from the day selection drop-down
Verify that the available ticket options for the selected day are displayed on the page
custom_expected:
Then
The day selection drop-down should allow to select a specific day and view the available ticket option for that day
The drop-down feature should work correctly for a variety of days and across different browsers and devices

title: Pricing component - Section selection
custom_preconds:
Given
User is on https://www.mlb.com/mets/tickets/pricing page
custom_steps:
When
1. Locate the Section selection drop-down feature on the page
2. Select a specific section from the section selection drop-down
3. Verify that the available ticket options for the selected section are displayed on the page
4. Verify section selection is working properly for variety of sections
custom_expected:
Then
1. The Section selection drop-down should allow the user to select a specific section and view available ticket options for that Section
2. The Section selection drop-down should work correctly for a variety of sections

title: Pricing component - Clear All Button
custom_preconds:
Given
User is on https://www.mlb.com/mets/tickets/pricing page
custom_steps:
When
User Selects a Specific date, section, and other options from the selection drop-down on the page
User clicks on Clear All button
Verify that all option selected are cleared and default options are displayed on the page
custom_expected:
Then
The Clear All button should allow the user to clear all selections made on the page
